metrics.description: The array of metrics that have to be graded according to the teacher.

name.description: The name of the metric to be evaluated. (Example: Verb tense)

metric_description.description: The description of the metric that the teacher intends to evaluate.

grading_type.description: The type of score that is going to represent how the student did in the assesment. For ecample: percentages, stars, number of mistakes, number of correct uses, or any other that the teacher specifies. If not specified, it will default to percentage or 0-100 score.

grading_type_description.description: The description of the grading_type so that an AI agent understands it. This explanation will help an AI agent judge the student's assesment
